content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='I-D.zuniga-paws-uk-use-cases-and-requirements'> <front> <title>UK Use Cases and Requirements</title>  <author initials='A' surname='Sago' fullname='Andy Sago'>     <organization /> </author>  <author initials='J' surname='Zuniga' fullname='Juan Zuniga'>     <organization /> </author>  <author initials='M' surname='Fitch' fullname='Michael Fitch'>     <organization /> </author>  <date month='October' day='16' year='2011' />  <abstract><t>This document proposes a simplification of the PAWS database discovery use case, two new use cases for indoor networking and machine to machine communications, and a set of requirements that drop out of all the use cases included so far in the working document.  These use cases and requirements especially address the TV White Spaces needs in the United Kingdom, as currently known.</t></abstract>  </front>  <seriesInfo name='Internet-Draft' value='draft-zuniga-paws-uk-use-cases-and-requirements-00' /> <format type='TXT'         target='http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-zuniga-paws-uk-use-cases-and-requirements-00.txt' /> </reference>
